author: yuga.eth
content: Hi! Sorry to spam if this is not quite the right channel -- could anyone point me to articles / documentation on how ETH 2.0 **block proposal** will work? IE, what constitutes a valid block and how transactions can be ordered and included in a block? I've combed through the specs and have read a fair amount about Casper FFG / LMD Ghost fit into consensus, but haven't quite figured out how the proposal process will change, if at all, from how it's done in 1.0.
